menu.item-veg-description: Mushroom and green peas cooked in a spicy onion & tomato based gravy with flavourful spices served with 2 parathas + rice + side salad + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Boneless chicken pieces cooked with aromatic spices in fried onion and tomato based gravy garnished with soft tomato and onion petals served with 2 parathas + rice + acahar + papad + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Chunks of Soft Indian cottage cheese in fragrant spinach sauce cooked with fragrant indian spices served with 2 parathas + rice + achar + side salad + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Tender chicken pieces cooked with different peppers and spices in a thick onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + achar + side salad + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Roasted cashew cooked in spicy thick gravy of onion and tomato served with 2 paratha + rice + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Spicy & tangy Manglorean style mackerel curry cooked in a flavourful sauce made with coconut and other spices served with 2 parathas + rice + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Mix vegetables simmered in thick coconut milk based gravy with whole spices served with 2 parothas + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A special kerala dish where tender pieces of chicken cooked in coconut oil and variety of spices that adds zing to the dish topped with creamy coconut paste for richness to the gravy served with  2parothas + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Delicious and aromatic basmati rice cooked with marinated panner in Indian spices on slow flame served with papad + yogurt dip + cucumber & tomato salad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Delicious and spicy mix of aromatic basmati rice and prawns, cooked in ghee and flavoured with warm and fragrant spices served with papad + mint yogurt dip + cucumber & tomato salad

menu.item-veg-description: Street style Indo-Chinese fried rice cooked in flavourful sauces and veggies with crispy burnt garlic served with some fried noodles and spicy schezwan sauce
menu.item-nonveg-description: Street style Indo-Chinese cooked in flavourful sauces with stir fried chicken and veggies topped with crispy burnt garlic served with some fried noodles and spicy schezwan sauce

menu.item-veg-description: Chickpeas boiled with whole spices then cooked in a freshly made spice blend and flavourful onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + pickled onion + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Boneless chicken cooked in aromatic and fragrant spices in yogurt, onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Mushrooms cooked with petals of onion, tomato and capsicum in freshly ground spice mix in a thick onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Juicy beef chunks cooked in aromatic spices and pepper in fragrant gravy of onion tomato and coconut based gravy served with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Lightly roasted paneer tossed in lip smacking onion & tomato based gravy with aromatic fragrant spices and topped with crispy garlic bits and cream served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + achar + side salad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A classic Goan recipe with tangy, spicy flavours in a creamy gravy made of coconut milk and aromatic spices served with rice + achar + papad + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Assorted vegetables cooked in creamy coconut milk with vinegar and tamarind for zesty tangy flavour served with rice + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Bonless chicken pieces marinated in aromatic fragrant spice mix and vingar for a spicy, tancy flavour served with rice + achar + side salad + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Slow cooked aromatic basmati rice and assorted vegetables cooked with fragrant spices and ghee served with mint yogurt dip + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A parsi delicacy of aromatic basmati rice and chicken cooked in fresh Iranian spices and cooked with tangy berries for a sweet flavourful and lip smacking taste served with beetroot yogurt

menu.item-veg-description: The most favourite Indo-Chinese dish of stir fired veggies in spicy lip smacking schezwan sauce served with some fried noodles and schezwan sauce
menu.item-nonveg-description: The most favourite Indo-Chinese dish of stir fired chicken & veggies in spicy lip smacking schezwan sauce served with some fried noodles and schezwan sauce
